original_text: For I the Lord love judgment, I hate robbery for burnt offering; and I will direct their work in truth, and I will make an everlasting covenant with them.
korean_text: 무릇 나 여호와는 정의를 사랑하며 불의의 강탈을 미워하여 성실히 그들에게 갚아 주고 그들과 영원한 언약을 맺을 것이라

sentences.original_text: For I the Lord love judgment
I hate robbery for burnt offering
and I will direct their work in truth
and I will make an everlasting covenant with them
